story:
fsm. is a monthly arts review journal covering contemporary arts in the Greater Fox River Valley of Wisconsin. fsm. is committed to:  providing critical reviews of the arts, by artists; highlighting upcoming, thought-provoking, local creative events; and offering an open platform for editorials discussing creative concerns, both local and otherwise. Both educating the community on the possibilities and importance of the arts as well as raising the level of local discourse about the arts are the goals of this publication.

fsm. is produced by a small staff of two dedicated creatives and seeks contributions from writers across the Greater Fox River Valley of Wisconsin.

Cristian Andersson (Editor-in-Chief) is an artist who works out of Matchbook Studio in Appleton, WI. While he primarily creates abstract oil paintings, in 2016 he started branching off into installation and performance pieces that deal with contemporary concerns: the overwhelming nature of our news, navigating interpersonal communication as it becomes more abstracted through social media, and the balance between notions of the self and the greater community. 

Katharina Abderholden (Managing Editor) graduated the University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee with a Bachelor in Fine Arts.   Professionally Katharina worked with Danceworks Milwaukee (USA), Le Marchepied (CH), and projects created by Stephen Kowplowitz(USA) and Cie Utilité Publique(CH).  Recently, Katharina has focused her performance work in site-specific/community based dance.  She has improvised and created with several artists focused in different artistic mediums in hopes to bridge human communication and to collaborate with different art processes.  

fsm. believes in paying for quality work. Our goal is to be able to pay our writers solely from community support.

We are building the community we want to create in.

story:
QUIMPER - PEKIN, késaco ?

Au programme : sport, découvertes, rencontres et architecture durable !



Notre projet d’expédition consiste à relier à vélo les deux extrémités du continent eurasien. Partant de Quimper, petite ville du Finistère, la "pointe du monde" occidental, dont nous sommes tous les deux originaires, nous rejoindrons à la force de nos mollets, Pékin, capitale du pays le plus dynamique de notre époque.

Munis de nos vélos et sacoches, nous passerons par 21 pays, en 330 jours, et cela avec des conditions climatiques souvent rigoureuses.

>> Nous quittons la France courant octobre 2014 ! <<


Si l’un des objectifs principaux de ce projet reste l’expérience d’une aventure sportive et humaine riche à travers l'Eurasie, le second consiste à étudier les l'architecture traditionnelle, ou "Architecture Vernaculaire", des régions traversées et des intérêts de sa potentielle réappropriation pour la conception moderne de bâtiments et de villes plus écologiques et durables.

Et oui, même LeMonde.fr le dit : la réactualisation du vernaculaire "s'inscrit pleinement dans notre époque et répond parfaitement aux questions actuelles sur l'avenir de la planète en s'appuyant sur le recyclage de matériaux locaux aux vertus bioclimatiques."

"Encore expérimental, le vernaculaire va désormais se généraliser."


Le fait de nous déplacer à vélo est une approche simple et sans prétention,  première étape vers le dialogue. Ainsi le déplacement à vélo favorise l’échange et permet d’établir un contact authentique avec les populations rencontrées. Le fait de couvrir près de 18 000 km à vélo à travers plus de 20 pays permet de multiplier les variations culturelles et de rendre d'autant plus pertinente l'étude des bâtiments traditionnels !







  • QUI SOMMES NOUS ? 

Vincent Helpin et Simon Fournier, deux jeunes ingénieurs âgés de 27 ans.



Amis de longue date, tous les deux originaires de la région de Quimper en Bretagne, nous n’avons jamais été très éloignés l’un de l’autre durant notre enfance, que ce soit à l’école, en vacances, à la plage, ou sur les terrains de sport.
Nous avons ensuite suivi le même parcours post-bac : classes préparatoires à Rennes, puis écoles d’ingénieurs.

Aujourd’hui nous exerçons tous les deux la même profession, à savoir ingénieur en performance énergétique et environnementale du bâtiment.

Sportifs depuis l'enfance, nous avons testé nos ambitions en pédalant dans une entente parfaite plus de 1 100 km à vélo entre Paris et Berlin en Mai 2013, et 700 km entre Nantes et Saint-Jean de Luz en Août 2013.
Depuis, l’envie commune de réaliser un voyage à vélo de bien plus grande envergure, nous motive plus que jamais !

     



  • LE PROJET ET SES ENJEUX 

La finalité du voyage est de promouvoir, pour la conception moderne de bâtiments, les intérêts oubliés des constructions traditionnelles représentatives de centaines d’années d’expérimentations et de réflexions de l’homme pour se protéger des contraintes climatiques locales.

Ce projet et ses potentiels intérêts font écho à de nombreuses problématiques qui découlent du développement durable puisque le secteur de la construction est le principal responsable des problèmes de la société moderne : 

                    - 45% de notre consommation énergétique

                    - 22% des émissions de CO2 françaises

En parallèle, en 2013, la facture énergétique de la France a augmenté de 12 % en 2013 et représente 3.5% du PIB français contre à peine 1%  dans les années 90... Les ménages les plus pauvres consacrent près de 15% de leur revenu aux dépenses énergétiques. (chiffres ADEME)


"Le secteur du bâtiment constitue donc un immense gisement d'économie d'énergie sur lequel il est possible d'agir à court et moyen termes !"


Face à ce constat et aux problèmes d'urbanisation rapide, les politiques, urbanistes, architectes et scientifiques sont alors de plus en plus amenés à se poser les questions suivantes :

  • "Comment construire de meilleures villes pour offrir de meilleures vies ?"
  • "Comment construire en respectant les traditions ancestrales d’un territoire ?"
  • "Comment intégrer intelligemment les contraintes environnementales à venir dans le secteur de la construction ?"

Nous sommes tous les deux convaincus que l'étude des principes vernaculaires ancestraux à travers le monde est une source d'inspiration et de réflexion plus que pertinente !

Centralité des "Tulous" chinois

Colombages en Bretagne.

Tours à vent en Iran, pas de climatisation !


Au retour de notre voyage, nos études et analyses réalisées sur la route nous serviront pour monter un reportage et une étude plus poussée sur les intérêts d'une réactualisation des principes astucieux des bâtiments. En effet, ces derniers ont traversé les siècles grâce à une agrégation d'enseignements à travers les âges mais aujourd'hui ils sont presque partout oubliés. Nous réaliserons une restitution commune avec un ami qui, lui, voyagera en Océanie et Amérique du Sud.

Nous travaillons avec l'association d'utilité publique Maisons Paysannes de France,  avec qui nous serons présents en Novembre 2015 au musée du Louvre pour la Semaine du Patrimoine !



 Comprendre l'habitat par son acteur premier : l'habitant !

Le voyage porte en lui une dimension humaine essentielle puisqu’il passera par la rencontre de personnes aux cultures et identités riches et hétéroclites. Notre logique d’ouverture aux gens nous conduira à loger autant que possible chez l’habitant de façon à surmonter les barrières culturelles et à nous ouvrir à l'inconnu. Lorsque cela ne sera pas possible, ou lorsque l'envie de dormir à la belle étoile se fera sentir, nous dormirons en tente.

Enfin, en parallèle, nous avons à cœur d'impliquer les plus jeunes dans notre aventure. C'est pourquoi nous allons 3 fois à la rencontre des élèves d'un collège finistérien (durant notre préparation, avant le départ, au retour) ; et en cours de route, ils pourront nous solliciter à tout moment. Le but est de les sensibiliser aux bienfaits du voyage, à l’importance des échanges culturels et de leur offrir un regard original sur le monde, différent de ce que proposent généralement les journaux télévisés !


  • LE  BUDGET ET NOS BESOINS 

Cela fait maintenant un an que nous nous préparons et montons le projet. Le budget estimé tourne autour de 25 000€ à 30 000€ en fonction des sommes que nous aurons à dépenser en cours de route et que nous ne maîtrisons pas totalement.

 

Partir à vélo au long court, pour des contrées lointaines et pas forcément accueillantes pour l’homme, nécessite du matériel étudié et sélectionné avec soin : robuste, ergonomique, léger, réparable, adapté aux différents climats, il s'agit là des caractéristiques déterminantes à concilier pour un tel voyage. Cela exige en amont une vraie préparation ainsi qu’un travail de sélection et de test.

Si nous avons pu trouver un certains nombres de sponsors et partenaires (que nous remercions grandement), il nous reste encore du chemin à parcourir ! C'est pourquoi nous faisons appel à vous chers lecteurs pour nous aider à compléter l'achat de notre matériel à hauteur de 1 500 €.

Pour vous en dire un peu plus, nos précédentes expéditions nous ont permis de nous forger des avis bien tranchés et de répartir le budget selon 7 grandes catégories :

  1. Le « matériel vélo » avec en premier lieu le « 2 roues » d’expédition : cadre robuste en acier, roues de 26 pouces, tout le matériel nécessaire à son bon fonctionnement et à l'entretien. Il s'agit du premier poste sur lequel nous nous sommes penchés : cadre en acier pour absorber les vibrations et facilement soudable.  
  2. Le matériel de camping : comprend tout ce qui sert à se reposer ou à se nourrir, ni plus ni moins ! Nous ne comptons plus les heures que nous avons passées  Au Vieux Campeur ou encore à Décathlon !
  3. Les vêtements, pour ne pas mourir de chaud ni de froid. Légers et fonctionnels, ils doivent être adaptés aux différents climats auxquels nous serons soumis, ainsi qu’à la pratique du vélo. Et oui, dans certains pays, la température pourra descendre parfois jusqu'à -20°C lorsque nous y serons !
  4. Le matériel de santé : trousse à pharmacie de premiers soins, produits d’hygiène, et vaccins  indispensables pour la traversée de certains pays.
  5. Le matériel ‘technologique’ : tout ce dont nous aurons besoin pour communiquer, échanger, enregistrer, se géo-localiser et déterminer précisément nos itinéraires. Résistants dans des conditions éprouvantes de températures, d’hygrométrie et de chocs, ces derniers sont relativement coûteux.
  6. Les dépenses administratives : Visas, frais bancaires, billet d'avion retour...
  7. Les dépenses quotidiennes durant un an. Nous les estimons de 10€ à 15€/jour par personne.


Afin de pouvoir vous ramener des images et vidéos toujours plus belles et communiquer en ligne et actualiser notre site internet tout au long du parcours, il nous reste à nous équiper de :

  • un second appareil photo
  • une caméra embarquée
  • une paire de jumelles 
  • une tablette numérique 
Le montant nécessaire s'élève à 1 500 €. Il s'agit donc de notre but à atteindre via le "crowdfunding".

C'est pourquoi nous faisons aujourd'hui appel à vous et à votre générosité chers lecteurs pour porter votre contribution à cette aventure en nous aidant à financer ces derniers équipements.



L’une de ces expressions vous parle ou l’un des fils directeurs de notre périple vous intéresse ? Nous  vous  invitons  alors  à  saisir  l’opportunité  de  soutenir  cette aventure ambitieuse ! Nous le rappelons, nous ne sollicitons le financement participatif qu'à hauteur de 1 500 € sur la totalité du budget de 30 000 € ; et cela en vue de parfaire l'équipement technologique !



    • UNE AVENTURE A PARTAGER !


      Comme vous le savez, le bouche à oreille n'a jamais aussi bien fonctionné qu'aujourd'hui !
      Alors même si vous ne pouvez nous aider financièrement mais que notre projet vous séduit nous vous remercions de partager à vos amis, collègues proches ou non cette aventure trépidante dans laquelle nous nous lançons ! N'hésitez plus ! A vos Likes et autres Tweet :)

      De notre côté, dès la création du projet, nous avons tenu à sensibiliser les plus jeunes aux bienfaits du voyages et aux problématiques environnementales. En effet, nous travaillons avec les élèves d’un collège finistérien et leur professeur en vue de leur apporter un regard original sur le monde. 

      Nous restons vivement intéressés pour recevoir le concours de toute personne physique ou morale souhaitant s’investir dans ce projet : possibilités de promouvoir le projet, propositions de compétences, de contacts médiatiques, de mises en relation, sont autant d’aspects importants pouvant contribuer à mener à bien cette aventure sportive et environnementale !


      Pour nous suivre et en savoir plus sur le projet, n'hésitez pas à consulter et partager notre page Facebook  ainsi que le site internet du projet : 

      www.facebook.com/QuimperPekinAVelo

      www.quimperpekinavelo.com

      Merci et à très vite pour de trépidantes péripéties !

      Vincent & Simon

story:
Where I'm Coming From

My name is Lauren Yates, and I have been performing my original poetry for the past five and a half years. In 2013, I had the pleasure of representing The Pigeon Presents: The Philadelphia Poetry Slam at the Women of the World Poetry Slam in Minneapolis, MN. 

Candid of me performing in a preliminary bout at WOWPS 2013. Photo Credit: Alison Broeren. 

This year, the 2015 Women of the World Poetry Slam is being held March 18-21 in Albuquerque, NM. I would very much like to attend, but, unfortunately, the slam gods have not been in my favor.
In both 2014 and 2015, I drew the number one slot in the WOWPS Qualifier that determined who would represent the Pigeon at the competition. 
For those unfamiliar with slam, drawing the one is the kiss of death. There is a pesky phenomenon known as "score creep," in which the judges of a poetry slam give higher and higher scores to poems as the night goes along. So, for instance, a poem performed at the beginning of the night may earn a "7," but an equally good poem performed at the end of the night may earn a "10." This phenomenon makes it highly unlikely for the poet who performed first to move onto the next level of competition, as was the case for me. Long story short, drawing the one for two consecutive years has negatively impacted any fighting chance I had to win the WOWPS Qualifier.

Spiting the Slam Gods

This is where you come in! WOWPS has two upcoming opportunities for women who are not registered for the slam, but wish to compete.
The first is the Brenda Moossy Video Slam. I have entered my poem "The Virgin Mary Considers Consent" into the contest. The poet that receives the most votes gets a guaranteed slot in the competition. Please vote for my poem. 
The second opportunity is the Last Chance Slam that takes place on the first night of WOWPS. The winner of the Last Chance Slam also gets a guaranteed slot in the competition. 

What's the Catch?

Even if I win the Brenda Moossy Video Slam or the Last Chance Slam, I still have to pay out of pocket for my airfare to Albuquerque and my hotel accommodations. 
My donation goal of $800 covers the cost of a plane ticket from Philadelphia to Albuquerque (approximately $500) and a room for four nights (approximately $300). 

I Need Your Help

I cannot afford to pay this $800 alone, and I am confident that I have a voice that needs to be heard in this competition. 
If you donate, you will receive my undying gratitude, along with some poetic perks to sweeten the deal (you can also donate and opt out of receiving perks, if that's your jam). Thank you all for your continued support!

Where I'm Coming From


My name is Lauren Yates, and I have been performing my original poetry for the past five and a half years. In 2013, I had the pleasure of representing The Pigeon Presents: The Philadelphia Poetry Slam at the Women of the World Poetry Slam in Minneapolis, MN. 


Candid of me performing in a preliminary bout at WOWPS 2013. Photo Credit: Alison Broeren. 

This year, the 2015 Women of the World Poetry Slam is being held March 18-21 in Albuquerque, NM. I would very much like to attend, but, unfortunately, the slam gods have not been in my favor.
In both 2014 and 2015, I drew the number one slot in the WOWPS Qualifier that determined who would represent the Pigeon at the competition. 
For those unfamiliar with slam, drawing the one is the kiss of death. There is a pesky phenomenon known as "score creep," in which the judges of a poetry slam give higher and higher scores to poems as the night goes along. So, for instance, a poem performed at the beginning of the night may earn a "7," but an equally good poem performed at the end of the night may earn a "10." This phenomenon makes it highly unlikely for the poet who performed first to move onto the next level of competition, as was the case for me. Long story short, drawing the one for two consecutive years has negatively impacted any fighting chance I had to win the WOWPS Qualifier.

Spiting the Slam Gods
This is where you come in! WOWPS has two upcoming opportunities for women who are not registered for the slam, but wish to compete.

story:
I'm Tom Dell'Aringa, comic artist and writer. I wanted a way to use my talents to give back this holiday season, and Christmas is my favorite time of year. This campaign helped me put the two together!

As long as anyone can remember, the Cave Goblins attacked the Christmas Elves on Christmas Eve at the North Pole. 


This Christmas Eve, as the night grows dark and the attack becomes imminent, one small Goblin is lonely, hungry and cold.


Seeing the light and warmth of the Elven camp, he steals away for a closer look, setting off a chain of events that will leave Goblins and Elves questioning everything.

Listen to the first two chapters of the audiobook by Steve Ogden!

What We Need & What You Get

Help us help the needy this holiday season. We're hoping to sell all 175 books, plus lots of audio books and PDFs to raise as much money as possible to feed the hungry.

ALL PROCEEDS go to the Northern Illinois Food Bank and Feed My Starving Children.

Risks & Challenges

I've run two crowdfunding campaigns in the past - this is my first here on this platform. Both were successful. The books are printed, the audio files are done, all we need is you

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about the campaign. Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Hey, folks.  

I trekked Everest back in 2014, and my friend and guide, Raj Amgain, now finds himself homeless after the Nepalese earthquake catastrophe.  He reached out to me to ask if there was any way I could help, and I CAN.  And I hope you will, too.  

If you read my account of my amazing adventure to basecamp, you know that Raj is the reason I made it off the mountain safely when I got hit with the bacterial infection and parasite.  He saved my life, now I'd like to repay the favor, with some help from my friends.

If you didn't read the story, you can here.  It'll tell you a little more about my friend and how excited I am to be able to pay back in his time of need.  ALL proceeds will go directly to Raj and his family.  Thank you so much for your help, friends.  I really appreciate it.

Much love,

James

story:
Me and My Diet

I used to be sixty pounds overweight. Then I lost sixty pounds and six pants sizes in less than a year.

People kept asking what my secret was.

That's how the Grady Diet started. I certainly never set out to write a diet book. Holy cow, I'm the last person you'd expect to write a diet book. I'm a single dad, living on the run, and I'm certainly no expert. But that's the point: there are a lot of us out there. Maybe you, or somebody you know, is in my shoes.

Thanks to my quest to find a simple way of dieting and keeping in shape, I've discovered some crazy and very down-to-earth ideas on nutrition and fitness. I want to share these ideas with EVERYONE, and I haven't got time to wait for an agent to take on my book. I believe this information needs to get out now, and that's why I'm going to Kindle. That's where you come in.

My passion is helping people. Before launching the book on Amazon Kindle, I believe a little publicity will do a lot to help the book reach the many people who can benefit from its simple ideas. A well-funded ad campaign will give this book national and global reach. It’s a wild idea, and thanks to Indiegogo, this idea now has feet and wings.

 

The Story of  the Diet

Thirty of those extra pounds I lost came from fattening up for a movie role and then not being able to shed the extra pounds. Sounds hilarious, I know.

My diet differs from other diets in major ways: it’s designed to be a brief read you can go back to again and again, for inspiration for courage. It’s not War and Peace. You can refer to the ladder chart, leaf a meaningful chapter or a read a tiny nugget to inspire you. And the book is funny. It’s got cartoons and a mascot, Sparky Spaniel, to cheer you on the right path. Laugh and lose, I say.

America's epic failure to multiply happiness and fitness for our people witnesses the futility of conventional diet approaches. If anything, the conventional approaches have been phenomenally successful at increasing the ranks of the overweight. What You Can Do: The Grady Diet contains something a lot of people need— the shockingly simple tools to attain the body and lives we desire.

The diet and book developed so spontaneously, it still amazes me. First a guy in the dry cleaners asked me what I’d done to lose so much weight. I gladly wrote up a sheet of pointers for him. That sheet grew into a 20-page pamphlet that debuted at the West Hollywood Book Fair. People kept saying I should print more copies and expand the book. Now it’s grown to a full-fledged book with lots of cartoons.

Your contributions will take it to the next level of what has already been a remarkable journey.

 

Join the Grady Bunch

The dream is bigger than the diet and your body. It's living a better and more contented life. Maybe you don't even care about slimming for your sake. You want to be a model of good habits for the people around you--for your kids, your family, and community. This is what your contribution means. The Grady Diet is about peace and happiness dividends. As I say on the video, being able to fit into your old pants, that's just a bonus. My diet is about an America that eats better and feels better. It starts now--one person at a time.

 

How the Money Will be Spent

 

Facebook ads

Google ads

Promotional Videos

Postcards

Pamphlets

Public Reading in Los Angeles

story:
FAQ #3: Anonymity!

We've had a few people ask, so we'd like to clarify, the having your name listed with the contributors is totally optional. You will have the chance to choose if and how your name appears!

FAQ #2: Let's look at some art!

Amanda Gannon is half of our team, and in addition to barking at strangers and talking to imaginary people, one of her hobbies is making art. Most of it is pretty cool.

She started on the art for the incentive prints today, and should have it done by the end of the campaign. That's not soon enough to give y'all an idea of what it will look like, though, so we're giving you a look behind the scenes.

She's taking some very pretty but very small ink drawings she did a while back and is enlarging and improving them.  These are the originals she's working from:

You can have prints of the final versions (again, not these, but super-incredibly-close), plus ebook, website membership for the duration of the serial, and listing with the contributors.

And someone, one lucky someone, will get the originals, which are 9x12, done in archival ink on vellum Bristol board.

FAQ #1: Let's talk about sex scenes.

Holy wow, we are 30% funded in three days! Please keep spreading that word!

Today, I thought we should share details about the bonus scene perk with prospective backers.

If you are brave and awesome enough to take this perk, you will get a sex scene of at least 3,000 words. It will be published in the book for everyone to enjoy, but unless the backer requests a dedication, their name will not be connected with it. You can choose two or three characters (more than that is a logistical nightmare both in reality and in fiction) and we will sex 'em up. It doesn't have to be a canonical mix, and we do not care one rodential posterior about orientation. Three guys? We can do that. It's all good.

If you want a specific something included, we'll do our best to accommodate that (within reason; "three weasels, some peanut butter, and a ping-pong-ball gun" would obviously be over the line, although we might ask you to visit next time you come to town).

If you want a specific something NOT included, we can do that.

All attempts at gratifying kinks will be met with our best effort, and limits are pretty soft. We're open to negotiation on anything except for kids/pooping/barfing/serious bodily harm.

Backers will have the option - and it is totally optional - to make up a list of up to ten things that they really, really like. It's conceivable that this might embarrass some people terrifically, but we assure you, whatever you are into, we have probably written worse for ourselves.

WHAT IS THIS?

The Golden Mask is an adults-only adventure novel, an action-packed sex-filled swashbuckler that . . . oh, here, just have a summary:

It is a time of airships, decadence, and splendor, a mad king rules over a terrified populace. Justice is in chains, replaced by the mad king's whim, the populace brought to heel by fear.

Born a commoner, Count Varian's heart still lies with the people, and the crimes inflicted on the populace by mad King Marivane enrage him. He has played the part of noble long enough, and now he must play the part of hero. He becomes the Golden Mask, anonymity his only shield against a traitor's death.

Ambrel has returned from long exile, driven by rage to avenge the destruction of her house. As Lady Fox, she harries the corrupt nobility, seeking the heart of the conspiracy that destroyed her family. Her cunning and fearlessness drive the Golden Mask to seek her aid, aid she is not necessarily willing to give.

Opposing them are those who now rule from the shadows: the king's advisor Urza, who has the kingdom wrapped in his shadowy web; and Raziel Morningstar, who enforces Urza's will with fire and sword and cruelty. Both are said to possess unnatural powers, and both are hungry for more.

Those who resist are swiftly silenced. Mass arrests fill the cells of the Tower of Justice, where innocent citizens await execution for false crimes.  Others are murdered outright. Some simply . . . vanish.

In a country in desperate need of heroes, who will be brave enough to answer that call?

OH MY GOD, WHO ARE YOU PEOPLE?

Paul Batteiger is an author, and will be taking the authorial reins on this project. Amanda Gannon is an author and artist, and will be editing and constructing the artsy perks. She will also be handling some of the sex and bonus scenes.

We love to write adventure stories with the sex left in. We love it so much, we started up Adventurotica.com, where we will publish The Golden Mask as a serial before releasing it as an ebook and a trade paperback.

The Golden Mask is sort of like Zorro and Catwoman versus Darth Vader and Rasputin, with Caligula as king, wrapped up in Three Musketeers-style swashbuckling and tied together with string cheese. Only way, way sexier than that sounds. It is exactly the kind of full-throttle cheesy adventure that you, in your heart of hearts, crave . . . only we don't fade to black and leave you to write the slash parts yourselves. (Although if you want to, we won't complain.)

Anyway, it's going to be awesome. There will be masked heroes and villains, daring swordfights, railing kills, airships, riots, murder, conspiracy, and loads of crazy, groping, sweaty-palmed, panting, clenching, groin-grinding sex. We have an unlimited special effects budget and absolutely no limits on what our actors will and will not do, and we abuse these advantages shamelessly.

WHAT WE NEED:

Money. (No point in beating around the bush.)

Here is how we will spend it:

  • A really cool cover. We'd like to pay someone to do this for us so our cover is not as awesomely bad as the trailer.
  • Materials for the incentives. All that fun stuff has to come from somewhere!
  • Living expenses. Food, bills, and a roof to turn away the life-leeching rays of the blazing hatestar – sorry, the sun. We have this annoying hierarchy of needs thing going on. Damn you, Maslow!
  • Medical care. Writing all these naughty words can be dangerous, you know. Paper cuts, repetitive stress injuries, tragic Hitachi accidents . . . it's a brutal line of work. (Have you ever tried to get lube out of a keyboard?) No, seriously, some of us need to be medicated for the public good.

And there you have it. Most of it is going towards keeping us alive. Is that exciting? No! But we have to stay alive to write smut. Contrary to what you might think, zombies don't write very interesting sex scenes. It's just a lot of moaning and cannibalism.

WHAT YOU GET:

The warm and fuzzy feeling of helping independent artists eke out a living pursuing their dream of providing quality adult entertainment to the teeming, hairy-palmed masses?

Not enough? Oh, fine.

Off to the right is a list of neat stuff we think you might enjoy, such as handmade bookmarks, art prints, and crazy things we are willing to do with words.

Do you read good books? (We hope so. Although evil eldritch tomes are also cool.) Old grocery lists and used envelopes are not worthy placeholders! You need something classy, like a velvet ribbon bookmark with dangly little charms! Default size will fit a regular paperback, but we can make them to any length you want.

Have you ever wanted a gruesome literary death? We have you covered. It's far more convenient than actually experiencing a gruesome death!

Frustrated by how your OTP never got it on? We have a perk for that, allowing you to order up a sexy scene featuring your favorite two (or three) characters. Doesn't even have to be canon, and we are extremely open-minded about content. We don't judge. Unless that's your thing.

Are you feeling the lack of art in your life? Amanda – and you can see more of her work here – will be drawing Nouveau-inspired portraits of Lady Fox and The Golden Mask, which will be turned into prints.  Or you can have the originals, if you're quick. We'll even make them an easy-to-frame standard US size.

Want to celebrate your unspeakable crimes? We can fix you up with a personalized Wanted poster. Think of it as advertising for your villainous services. You may never get a better chance to brag.

Need to conceal your identity from your enemies? We'll give you the actual (insert theme music here) GOLDEN MASK. (The mask mask. Not the guy in the mask. Sorry. It's really hard fitting an entire action hero into a flat-rate shipping box without getting gruesome.)

At the very least, you will be getting an awesome swashbuckling erotic adventure story delivered to your inbox. I am not seeing a downside. Unless you share an email address with your mother. How embarrassing.

WHAT HAPPENS:

We post the book serially on our site. This will be our 6th novel, and we've never failed to post three serial updates a week. We are reliable. The story will be finished on time. It is projected to run between 50 and 60 chapters, and should be between 125,000 and 150,000 words.

  • Memberships to Adventurotica will be available for use immediately, meaning you can follow along there, three times a week, until the story ends.
  • If you've bought yourself any sort of walk-on role or bonus scene, that will obviously come out with the ebook.
  • The ebook won't come out until after the book has been published in serial form on Adventurotica.com, which should wrap up in February. You'll be able to read it at Adventurotica the entire time.
  • Print books will be released at the same time as the ebook.
  • Production of material incentives like prints and bookmarks and so forth will begin after the campaign ends, but this bit is not anticipated to take terribly long.

If we don't make goal, we'll still be able to provide the perks for everyone who did donate, and we'll do the best we can on what we get.

THE IMPACT:

This is the part where we're supposed to explain how our project is valuable to you and to the world. No pressure. I'd love to claim that our project will bring about world peace by making sure nobody has a hand free to pull a trigger, but that seems unlikely.

  • What we can do is make people happy. Have a good time. Bring something that is unreservedly fun into the world, just because it belongs here.
  • Erotica is an important genre, and we want to make it a better, more entertaining place. Bottom line, people often complain, with good reason, that good erotica is difficult to find. That most of it is poorly-written. That the characters are flat. That the sex is boring. That it doesn't tell an interesting story.
  • We want to give readers entertainment for adults, not just adult entertainment. There is a dire shortage of well-written, fast-paced, plot-heavy long-form erotica. We want to write a book that provides you, the reader, with a well-told adventure story that doesn't fade to black just when things are getting good.
  • We want to encourage independent erotica publishing by being part of it. By publishing independently, we are freeing ourselves from the restrictions placed on authors by publishers; restrictions on content, on length, on ratio of plot to sex. We aren't breaking rules. We're stepping outside of them. We're doing our own thing, our way. And you can help!

HOW YOU CAN HELP:

Boost the signal! If you can't contribute, that's fine.  You can still tell everyone about us.

There are share tools right here on Indiegogo!  Also, we are assuming you have some social network stuff going on, so spreading the word that way would be super-awesome of you.

We're sure you have friends who would appreciate some swashbuckling smuttery, so, really, you'll be doing them a service sending them our way.

We sincerely appreciate those who support us by helping to spread the word. Y'all do a lot of good, and we cannot thank you enough.

Medical care. Writing all these naughty words can be dangerous, you know. Paper cuts, repetitive stress injuries, tragic Hitachi accidents . . . it's a brutal line of work. (Have you ever tried to get lube out of a keyboard?) No, seriously, some of us need to be medicated for the public good.
And there you have it. Most of it is going towards keeping us alive. Is that exciting? No! But we have to stay alive to write smut. Contrary to what you might think, zombies don't write very interesting sex scenes. It's just a lot of moaning and cannibalism.
WHAT YOU GET:
The warm and fuzzy feeling of helping independent artists eke out a living pursuing their dream of providing quality adult entertainment to the teeming, hairy-palmed masses?
Not enough? Oh, fine.
Off to the right is a list of neat stuff we think you might enjoy, such as handmade bookmarks, art prints, and crazy things we are willing to do with words.
Do you read good books? (We hope so. Although evil eldritch tomes are also cool.) Old grocery lists and used envelopes are not worthy placeholders! You need something classy, like a velvet ribbon bookmark with dangly little charms! Default size will fit a regular paperback, but we can make them to any length you want.
Have you ever wanted a gruesome literary death? We have you covered. It's far more convenient than actually experiencing a gruesome death!
Frustrated by how your OTP never got it on? We have a perk for that, allowing you to order up a sexy scene featuring your favorite two (or three) characters. Doesn't even have to be canon, and we are extremely open-minded about content. We don't judge. Unless that's your thing.
Are you feeling the lack of art in your life? Amanda – and you can see more of her work here – will be drawing Nouveau-inspired portraits of Lady Fox and The Golden Mask, which will be turned into prints.  Or you can have the originals, if you're quick. We'll even make them an easy-to-frame standard US size.
Want to celebrate your unspeakable crimes? We can fix you up with a personalized Wanted poster. Think of it as advertising for your villainous services. You may never get a better chance to brag.
Need to conceal your identity from your enemies? We'll give you the actual (insert theme music here) GOLDEN MASK. (The mask mask. Not the guy in the mask. Sorry. It's really hard fitting an entire action hero into a flat-rate shipping box without getting gruesome.)
At the very least, you will be getting an awesome swashbuckling erotic adventure story delivered to your inbox. I am not seeing a downside. Unless you share an email address with your mother. How embarrassing.
WHAT HAPPENS:
We post the book serially on our site. This will be our 6th novel, and we've never failed to post three serial updates a week. We are reliable. The story will be finished on time. It is projected to run between 50 and 60 chapters, and should be between 125,000 and 150,000 words.

Memberships to Adventurotica will be available for use immediately, meaning you can follow along there, three times a week, until the story ends.
If you've bought yourself any sort of walk-on role or bonus scene, that will obviously come out with the ebook.
The ebook won't come out until after the book has been published in serial form on Adventurotica.com, which should wrap up in February. You'll be able to read it at Adventurotica the entire time.
Print books will be released at the same time as the ebook.
Production of material incentives like prints and bookmarks and so forth will begin after the campaign ends, but this bit is not anticipated to take terribly long.
If we don't make goal, we'll still be able to provide the perks for everyone who did donate, and we'll do the best we can on what we get.
THE IMPACT:
This is the part where we're supposed to explain how our project is valuable to you and to the world. No pressure. I'd love to claim that our project will bring about world peace by making sure nobody has a hand free to pull a trigger, but that seems unlikely.


What we can do is make people happy. Have a good time. Bring something that is unreservedly fun into the world, just because it belongs here.

Erotica is an important genre, and we want to make it a better, more entertaining place. Bottom line, people often complain, with good reason, that good erotica is difficult to find. That most of it is poorly-written. That the characters are flat. That the sex is boring. That it doesn't tell an interesting story.

We want to give readers entertainment for adults, not just adult entertainment. There is a dire shortage of well-written, fast-paced, plot-heavy long-form erotica. We want to write a book that provides you, the reader, with a well-told adventure story that doesn't fade to black just when things are getting good.

We want to encourage independent erotica publishing by being part of it. By publishing independently, we are freeing ourselves from the restrictions placed on authors by publishers; restrictions on content, on length, on ratio of plot to sex. We aren't breaking rules. We're stepping outside of them. We're doing our own thing, our way. And you can help!
HOW YOU CAN HELP:
Boost the signal! If you can't contribute, that's fine.  You can still tell everyone about us.
There are share tools right here on Indiegogo!  Also, we are assuming you have some social network stuff going on, so spreading the word that way would be super-awesome of you.
We're sure you have friends who would appreciate some swashbuckling smuttery, so, really, you'll be doing them a service sending them our way.
We sincerely appreciate those who support us by helping to spread the word. Y'all do a lot of good, and we cannot thank you enough.

story:
Hello, my name is Brenda Godson and I am a published author and the administrative assistant to Evangelist and author, Jack Taylor with Dimensions Ministries in Melbourne, Florida.  I have served as an office manager and project coordinator for a construction company, a children's shelter and two law firms as well as handled books for the City of Palm Shores, Play It Again Sports and Heck Air Aviation.  I have been actively involved in church ministry since 1995 and for ten of those years, served as a pastor on staff with a local non-denominational church, with an emphasis on ministry to women, the homeless and the addicted community.

I excel at seeing strengths in others and promoting those strengths by directing and mentoring others to a place of full activation.  I also has a unique ability to communicate deeper truths to others in a speaking environment, provoking them to action.

My new book, The Journey to Discovery is a compilation of lessons I have learned throughout the years.  Having served Jack Taylor for many years, much insight has been received in hours of interaction with him about how to walk through life under God's Kingdom rule.

This new book project will give me the opportunity to share who I was, where I am and where I'm heading.  I have been through many life-changing events that have taken me to the depths of hopelessness and despair, but in Christ, all things are possible to those that believe.  This book is a testimony that no matter what comes our way, our God is greater and more than able to turn our lives into something that will not only bring Him glory, but bring others to a full knowledge of the Greater I AM.

This project has also launched me into a cosmic perspective on life.  Not that I have embraced it completely, but the possibilities of what God is showing me are endless.  It is a journey into a realm beyond our natural thoughts and into a place where we only dream of being.  I share some of that thought provoking insight as the reader embarks with me on my Journey to Discovery!

As a contributor to this project, you will help to make God's reflective thoughts a reality to others. You may even find similar signposts on your Journey to Discovery.

It is my belief that each one of us receives valuable insight into the full picture of the Kingdom of God.  No one person has the whole picture, but each has a piece that brings God's plans into full view. My part is just a part of the whole.  Nothing in life happens by chance. God has all of his children on a training program and an equipping mission for something greater than themselves.  

Your contribution will help me to share my part, which I believe is a catalyst to extending a little more of the Kingdom on earth!

Recently my first book was released, entitled "Alayna, a Tribute to Courage and Destiny in a Life Never Lived."  Having been on the market for a few short weeks, I am already receiving powerful testimonies to the effects of having shared such the intimate story of the loss of my granddaughter who was stillborn. Many are finding comfort, healing, and even some have found a renewed desire to reconnect with their one true love, Jesus! I believe this second book can have an even greater impact on you and others as we all travel The Journey to Discovery! (If you would like a copy of my first book, Alayna, a Tribute to Courage and Destiny in a Life Never Lived," go to http://brendagodson-com.webs.com/.)

Thank you for joining me on this adventure! No amount is too small to give to help me get this book published. My publisher is also offering some cool incentives for you to donate, too! So, thanks for your help and pray for me as I finish up the final additions to a story of possibilities!

story:
What's this all about anyway?

I'm a science fiction fan. I am also a big science buff though, so I can't help but notice inconsistencies or errors in Sci-Fi when it comes to the science involved.

In my studies of robotics, and evolution, I came to a realization that basically no one had gotten Artificial Intelligence correct.

The way it's depicted in most outlets is something along the lines of a super computer, or a network of computers that is super smart and somehow becomes self aware (usually looking to then take over the planet).

I argue that this could not be the case though for a truly LIVING inorganic sentience.

All living, intelligent things develop. They start in a womb, or an amniotic egg, where their senses begin doing some work, and gradually more and more information come in to the brain, sometimes, as in the case of humans, for decades before they are generally considered 'mature'. They learn. Society, and sociology is key in how anything develops.

There have been a few instances of this, and I would not claim my idea is 100% origional, but it is surely not the path normally taken.

HAL, the super computer of 2001: A Space Odyssey for instance, listed as one of the top 10 movie villains of all time, and regarded as a fan favorite of Artificial Intelligence, is in fact only a computer running a program. The Robots in iRobot as well, are nothing more than systems following code.

I look to move beyond that, in to Synthetic Intelligence.

When I first figured out the science behind how it would happen, I then set to put that in a setting and tell the story.

Omega Children is part 1 of that story, and I have had an absolute blast writing it.

Much of the book follows the creation and development of the things themselves, the Omegas- while later we deal with the repercussions of our creations.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The following in an excerpt from Chapter 5.

Lucas who they are speaking of, is the lab's governing computer system.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Everyone began talking and hurriedly flicking through read outs and results, scanning if they may have missed something from the past few hours.

Doctor Kowles was instantly in his command window diving in to the diagnostics of his system.

Alison had assumed that everyone would go home then since Lucas had basically shelved the entire operation for the night, but in reality the opposite happened.

The whole team hunkered down in to crisis mode to get a full understanding of the situation.

“Lucas is like… a mother who just had a difficult birth.” Alison observed.

“Clever analogy.” Doctor Kowles responded as he drew a diagram on his BluScroll.

“It’s not just an analogy, it’s remarkably similar Randall,” she pressed “he is giving pieces of himself to create another- he is going through pain and torment and depleting his own resources so the Omegas can live.”

“He doesn’t feel pain or torment.”

“It sure appeared that way!” she replied.

“That’s because he’s supposed to appear that way, that's his programming.” He snapped, unusually short with her.

Alison noticed the hint, but ignored it, “then why would he change the schedule?”

Doctor Kowles was visibly aggravated that she wasn’t leaving him alone, but showed remarkable poise in answering the question, “The underlying problem is real. A system needs a certain amount of things to work properly. It needs the right power, the right throughput, the right temperature, the right formatting, a bunch of things. Lucas saw something in the Omegas that wasn’t right and maneuvered to correct the problem. That’s what he’s supposed to do.”

“So he is protecting them?”

“I mean yes he is protecting them, but not out of maternal or paternal instinct. We’ve given him the task of getting the Omegas from initial activation through their early infancy so he is just following our commands.”

She continued, “and what about him?”

“He observed he was beginning to slow down or fail at some process his security algorithms deemed critical to completing his main task of rearing the Omegas, so he’s addressing that problem.”

That made sense to Alison, but there was still that lingering nag that something wasn’t right.

“So, why are you and everyone else going crazy?” she asked.

Doctor Kowles gnawed on his bottom lip some and then released it with a large exhale.

“What is going on Randall?”

“Lucas is purposely not involving us in his diagnosis,” he began “I mean, I’m in, I’m looking at him and I can do things, but it’s like he doesn’t want me to. He’s never said he will fix himself before and then shut down. He is supposed to unlock so the engineers can help fix him. It’s like, a patient not letting a doctor work.”

“He’s not letting you help? Can he do that?”

“He never could before or at least never tried it.” Doctor Kowles answered.

She sat there a moment and connected the dots, “His newest high priority is the Omegas and their security. Is he not letting you in because he is worried you’ll do something to them?”

He didn’t answer.

“Fick Randall, are you telling me he is taking this to an extreme and actually protecting them from us?”

“Like an overprotective mother who won’t leave the ER and let the surgeons do their job. But he doesn’t have emotion like that- he has run his logics and figured we’re too stupid to help so he insists to do it himself- it’s… pretty astounding.”

 ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Give and Receive

I am self-publishing the book, but I do want to try to expand the market somewhat and go at this professionally.

I have hired a professional illustrator who has worked in motion entertainment and the comic book industry. The basic design accompanying this proposal is one of the options for a rough sketch for the cover design.

Part of this fundraiser will go to pay that image licensing fee.

A small part of the funds raised will be for the purchase of the initial run of books that I can distribute to sponsors here.

All remain money, with no maximum, will go towards getting the book actually published and out there. This includes but is not limited to, initial print run, merchandising, marketing, and distribution.

If the goal is not reached, all funds will be used to ensure sponsor's perks are met, with the remaining used for the illustration fee. 

 

What's Next?

The book is as of today, March 6th, just shy of complete. I have been editing as I go along, but will need a final edit and then to wrap up the details with the cover and the printer and I expect the book itself to enter print during the late spring/early summer.
 

Who is Mike Slade?

Me.

I am.

My actual last name is Bologna, which isn't the most convenient name when trying to sell a semi-serious book, so I will be going by the pen name of Mike Slade.

 

Can't contribute?

No worries.

Follow the facebook page to keep up to date on the progress of the book and when it is released!

https://www.facebook.com/TheOmegaChildren

story:
Mejorando la Salud Mental en Nicaragua

Proyecto de Fundación Manantial y Grupo de Acción Comunitaria

El proyecto ‘Mejorando la Salud Mental en Nicaragua’ se desarrolla en el departamento de Estelí, al noroeste del país, donde la enfermedad mental condena a muchas personas a vivir el resto de sus vidas encerradas sin tratamiento adecuado, relegándolas a un aislamiento deshumanizante que produce el agravamiento de su enfermedad.

Para que estas personas puedan salir de ese aislamiento, necesitamos tu ayuda. ¡Tu colaboración puede abrir muchas puertas!

¿Por qué Nicaragua?

Nicaragua es un país de América Central, con una extensión de 130.682 Km2 y una población de 5.4 millones de habitantes, de los que la mayoría viven en la capital, Managua.

Ha sufrido numerosas catástrofes naturales, ha sobrevivido a una guerra y ha padecido grandes oscilaciones políticas que han impedido su mayor desarrollo económico y social. Actualmente, es el país más pobre de América Latina después de Haití. El 48.3% de la población vive bajo el umbral de la pobreza y el 17 % en lo que se considera pobreza extrema que se multiplica por tres en contextos rurales.

Situado en el noroeste del país y con una población de 225.000 habitantes, aproximadamente, el departamento de Estelí es el lugar donde vamos a llevar a cabo nuestro proyecto.

A pesar de que la prioridad del gobierno actual es mejorar la calidad de vida de los ciudadanos nicaragüenses mediante la promoción y protección de su salud general, la salud mental permanece aún muy desatendida.

Salud mental en Nicaragua

No existe a nivel nacional una red estructurada de salud mental y se carece, por el momento, de un Plan Nacional de Salud Mental. Existen, por tanto, grandes necesidades de atención en Salud Mental. Como ejemplo, todo el departamento de Estelí cuenta con solo 1 médico psiquiatra del Ministerio de Salud, cuando en España, para esa misma población, contaríamos con 12.

​La Dirección Departamental de Salud del Ministerio de Salud de Nicaragua (MINSA), ​está decidida a acabar con esta situación y a fortalecer la red de atención a los pacientes con Trastorno Mental Grave como una apuesta de la sanidad pública por estructurar un sistema de atención en salud mental inclusivo y basado en el respeto de los derechos humanos.

Nuestro plan de trabajo en el departamento de Estelí tiene un objetivo principal: la promoción del trato humano y del tratamiento adecuado a los pacientes más aislados o encerrados.

¿En qué situación están las personas encerradas?

Partiendo de los datos de que se dispone actualmente, calculamos que en todo el Departamento de Estelí podrá haber en situación de encierro o gran aislamiento hasta la quinta parte de los pacientes con trastorno mental grave. Es decir, si hasta la fecha y a falta de completar el registro en dos de los municipios, se han registrado más de 300 casos, calculamos que podrán estar viviendo en situación de encierro un mínimo de 50 personas.

Las personas con enfermedad mental son encerradas por episodios de mucha agitación fruto de descompensación psicopatológica o de los efectos adversos de la medicación.

Algunos pacientes están sin tratamiento de ningún tipo: ni farmacológico ni

psicosocial, y los que toman alguna medicación lo hacen con escaso seguimiento de su respuesta a la misma, padeciendo importantes efectos adversos.

Todos los pacientes en esta situación se encuentran psicopatológicamente descompensados, con sintomatología positiva muy activa (alucinaciones y delirios) y casi nulo contacto con la realidad.

Dependiendo del tiempo que lleven en situación de encierro, se encuentran más o menos deteriorados, pero en general hay una pérdida de la autonomía en casi todas las áreas.

Especialmente carecen de capacidad para relacionarse con otras personas, siendo casi imposible mantener algún contacto personal.

Las condiciones higiénicas de los lugares de encierro son muy insalubres. En muchos de los casos, no cuentan con un WC, un simple colchón o una ventana.

Cuando se encierra a la persona al inicio de los problemas o cuando estos se repiten, surge un acostumbramiento a la situación y esta se normaliza y acepta en la familia.

¿Quiénes son las Brigadistas de Salud?

Las brigadistas de salud son personas de la propia comunidad, principalmente mujeres, que se encargan de manera voluntaria de conocer, seguir y supervisar el estado de salud de sus vecinos en la comunidad. Participan de manera muy activa en el terreno, realizando diversas campañas de prevención y detección, y lo hacen con una estrecha colaboración entre el personal sanitario de atención primaria.

En general se muestran muy motivadas para realizar trabajos comunitarios y son personas relevantes dentro de sus comunidades. En todo el departamento de Estelí se estima que existen 480 comunidades y, en cada comunidad, el número de brigadistas varía de una a tres. Y a todas ellas quiere llegar nuestro Programa. A día de hoy ya hemos incorporado a la causa de la salud mental a 401 brigadistas.

Un balance hasta la fecha de hoy

Hace casi tres años que esta iniciativa surgió con una mochila y una libreta cruzando calles de Madrid y de Estelí. Hoy, podemos afirmar que esta idea tiene sentido, marco, estructura y forma, que creemos en nuestra apuesta.

El proyecto surge a partir de la ilusión, esfuerzo y coordinación de organizaciones e instituciones que apuestan por una intervención en Salud Mental desde la comunidad, luchando por la integración, respeto y dignidad de las personas que conviven con algún trastorno mental grave.

Nicaragua, país de lagos y volcanes, ha sido el marco en el que se han desarrollado las diferentes líneas de acción. Bajo el paraguas del Ministerio de Salud Nicaragüense, de la mano de la Fundación Manantial y el Grupo de Acción Comunitaria, se trabaja con el objetivo de mejorar la atención de las personas con trastorno mental grave en el departamento de Estelí.

Podemos hablar de resultados, necesidades y potencialidades, pero sabemos que queda mucho por hacer. Después de tres años de esfuerzo y aprendizajes, en las calles y casas de las comunidades ya se habla de salud mental. Los centros de salud exponen murales psicoeducativos, los encierros y aislamientos son detectados, señalados, juzgados y abordados en coordinación con diferentes instituciones,... y existe un registro que permite conocer qué personas tienen algún trastorno mental. Historias clínicas y planes de atención aseguran un seguimiento por parte de los profesionales.

Los equipos de atención primaria, las personas brigadistas de salud o líderes comunitarias se sienten “empoderadas” y formadas, intervienen en la detección y seguimiento, forman parte indispensable del abordaje psicosocial que requiere cada caso. Tenemos materiales que nos permiten recordar todo lo que hemos aprendido en los talleres de capacitación y difundirlo en las familias, las comunidades y los centros de salud.

La idea es defender la Salud mental como un derecho universal. El respeto a las personas con algún trastorno mental y su identidad, la lucha por un tratamiento adecuado y un trato digno. La búsqueda de la rehabilitación, la integración y la autonomía de todas estas personas. La constante denuncia a cualquier vulneración de derechos y aislamiento.

Creemos en una salud mental comunitaria y sabemos que es posible en Estelí.

Gracias a nuestro recorrido, tenemos claras las necesidades y las líneas de acción, ahora necesitamos sumar esfuerzos para poder llegar a todas las casas, para poder formar en todas las comunidades, para poder acompañar a todas las familias y con esto, lograr una atención integral e igualitaria para todas las personas con trastorno mental grave de Estelí.

¿A qué se destinará el dinero recaudado?

Aunque nuestro objetivo es muy ambicioso, hemos decidido centrar la meta en la capacitación de profesionales y la sensibilización de las familias para poder seguir sacando a estas personas de su encierro y tratándolas en la comunidad, para lo que necesitaríamos 4.000€.

Si no puedes ayudar económicamente, por favor difunde nuestro proyecto. Si le damos visibilidad, podremos mejorar la salud mental en Nicaragua.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Improving Mental health in Nicaragua

A Project by Fundación Manantial and Grupo de Acción Comunitaria

The Project ‘Improving Mental health in Nicaragua’ is located at the Estelí Department, in Northern Nicaragua, where people with serious mental disorder are locked up without an appropriate medical treatment, isolated in inhumane conditions that aggravate their illness.

We need your help to free these people. Your cooperation will open so many doors!

Present situation in Estelí (Nicaragua)

Nicaragua is a country in Central America, with an extension of 130,682 sq. km., and it has a population of 5.4 million, most of whom are living in the capital, Managua.

Over the last few decades Nicaragua has suffered from a number of natural disasters, has survived a war and has also suffered wide swings in politics that have impeded further economic and social development. Nowadays, it is the poorest country of Latin America after Haiti. Over 48% of the population lives under the poverty threshold and 17% in extreme poverty. This increases by a factor of three in rural contexts.

The Estelí Department, in Northern Nicaragua, has approximately 225,000 inhabitants and there is where we’re going to develop our project.

In such a context, the current Government has assigned top priority to improve the quality of life of Nicaragua citizens promoting and protecting general health and human rights. So that mental health cannot be properly met.

Mental health in Nicaragua

At national level a structured mental health network does not yet exist and, for the time being, there is no a National Mental Health Care Plan providing general guidelines. The single point of reference is a National Programme dated 2003 that was never implemented. As an example of the acute mental health-care needs, we can mention that the Estelí Department has 1 public psychiatrist when Spain would have 12 for this population.

The request for technical assistance and support in terms of human resources in order to strengthen the network of care for persons with serious mental disorders from the Directory of Health Care in Nicaraguan Ministry of Health (MINSA), determined to end with this situation, lies within this framework of great needs and as a commitment of the Public Health to structure an inclusive mental health-care system human-rights based.

Our work plan for the Strengthening of the Mental Health Network in the Department of Estelí has a main objective: promoting humane treatment and appropriate care to the most isolate or locked up patients.

What is the situation of the locked up persons?

From the data currently available, we estimate that in the Department of Estelí one fifth of the patients with serious mental disorder could be locked up. In other words, up to now and in the absence of completing the records of 2 municipalities (more than 300 cases have already been registered) we estimate that a minimum of 50 persons are locked up or very isolated.

The main reason why they are locked up is because they suffer much upheaval episodes as a result of psychopathological unbalance (hallucinations and delirium) or because of the adverse impacts of medication given without any specialized supervision.
  • Many patients are lacking access to both pharmacological and psychosocial treatments. Those taking medication do it without any follow up on their response and suffering significant adverse effects.
  • All the patients in this situation are psycho pathologically unbalanced. They sometimes hear voices that are not there and have “visions” out of touch with the reality.
  • Depending upon the time they are locked up, they are more or less damaged but, in general, there is a loss of autonomy in almost all the areas.
  • They particularly lack the capacity to relate to other people. It is almost impossible to keep a personal link with them.
  • The hygiene conditions of their place of confinement are very unhealthy. In many cases, they do not have even a toilet, a mattress or a window.
  • Once the person has been locked up, when the problems began or when they repeat, there is a routinisation and the situation is normalizing and accepted by the family.

One of the strategies of our plan consists in raising awareness and training a very special group of persons in Nicaragua: the female health brigades.

Who are the Female Health Brigades?

They are persons from the community itself, mainly women, who voluntarily are responsible for knowing, following up and overseeing the health of their neighbors. They are actively involved in the field by carrying out prevention and detection campaigns in close cooperation with the primary health care staff.

In general, they are highly motivated to work within the community or the villages they live in. They are also prominent persons within their communities. There are an estimated 480 communities over all the Department of Estelí. In each community the number of brigades varies (3 to 1). Our programme wants to reach all of them. To this day, we have already incorporated 401 female brigades to the mental health cause.

The balance to date

It is nearly three years since this initiative arose with a backpack and a notebook, throughout the streets of Madrid and Estelí. Today, we can affirm that this idea makes sense, within a framework, it has a structure and a shape and we believe in our commitment.

The project arises from the illusion, the efforts and coordination of the organizations and institutions that bet on mental health intervention within the community, fighting for the integration, respect and dignity of the persons living with a serious mental disorder.

Nicaragua, the country of lakes and volcanoes, has been the framework in which the various lines of action have been developed. Under the protection of the Nicaraguan Ministry of Health, going in hand with the Fundación Manantial and the Community Action Group, work is done with the aim of improving care for people with serious mental disorders in the Department of Estelí.

We can speak of results, needs and potentials, but we know that much remains to be done. After three years of efforts and learnings, people in the streets and the homes of communities are already referring to mental health. Health Centers exhibit psychoeducational murals, confinements and isolations are detected, identified, tried and addressed in coordination with the appropriate institutions…and there is a record which provides information about persons with a mental disorder. Medical records and health care plans allow for the monitoring by health care professionals. The primary-care teams, the female brigades or the community leaders feel empowered and trained, they are involved in detecting and monitoring and are an indispensable part of the psychosocial approach required for each case. We have materials which enable us to remember all that we have learned in the training workshops and to disseminate it amongst the families, the communities and the health centers.

The idea is none other than defend mental health as a universal right, the respect for people with a mental disorder as well as for their identity and the fight over for an appropriate and dignified treatment; seeking for rehabilitation, integration and autonomy of all these persons; constantly denouncing any violation of their rights and the confinement.

This is, in short, the community mental health we believe in and the one we are helping to implement and develop in Estelí. We now know that it is possible and we clearly see the needs and the lines of action. We need to join efforts to reach all the homes, to train in all the communities, to accompany families and to achieve, with this, a comprehensive and egalitarian care for all the persons with a serious mental disorder in the Department of Estelí.

¿What will be the use of the money collected?

7.000€ for trips inside Nicaragua and Spain-Nicaragua

4.000€ for personnel training

2.000€ for computer support

12.000€ for stay

Thank you for your kind collaboration. Your help will open so many doors!

calculamos que podrán estar viviendo en situación de encierro un mínimo de 50
personas.

episodios de mucha agitación fruto de descompensación psicopatológica o de los
efectos adversos de la medicación.
Algunos pacientes están sin tratamiento de ningún tipo: ni
farmacológico ni psicosocial, y los que toman alguna medicación lo hacen con
escaso seguimiento de su respuesta a la misma, padeciendo importantes efectos
adversos.

Todos los pacientes en esta situación se encuentran

autonomía en casi todas las áreas.
Especialmente carecen de capacidad para relacionarse con

Cuando se encierra a la persona al inicio de los problemas o

story:
Hola amigos, 

Como veis soy un poco pidon y este año quiero un regalazo de cumpleaños. El mejor regalo que me puede dar la vida (gente querida) en este año es ir a ver jugar al fútbol sala a mi hermano y uno de los más grandes amigos que me ha dado la vida.

Estoy viviendo en Abu Dhabi (si soy multimillonario, pero me lo gasto todo en fiestas) y el billete es más caro de lo que me puedo permitir en estos momentos, estaba pensando pedir pasta a mi madre como de costumbre... pero el video de mi amiga Esther junto con la campaña en esta pagina de mi amiga Nati me dio la idea de hacer una pedida general a todos esos amigos que quieran hacerme un regalazo este año y se lo puedan permitir. Que cumplo 30. jar jar jar!!!

Partido 15 de Diciembre Sabado (Fieston de cumpleaños y celebración del partido)

Estado mirando villetes y por 500 Euros puedo conseguirlos pero 50 horas de vuelo cosa que me mata pudiendo pasar dos dias más allí. (Solo puedo pedir 4 dias en el trabajo)

Por 700 Leuros puedo conseguir en 23 horas de vuelo y estar en la resaca con todos vosotros.

Se que puedo conseguirlo, no quiero que ninguno se quite de nada por ayudarme. Como siempre siempre estoy en deuda con vosotros pongais o no dinero, ya habeis estado ahi siempre demostrando quienes sois.

No se como pagar los que colaboreis, ya sabeis que siempre me escapo... pero si lo consigo prometo que no faltara alcohol ni buena gente en esa fiesta que pienso organizar despues del partido.

Son las 2 de la mañana (5 horas pa despertarme) y estoy pensando que puedo ofreceros a los que esteis en Madrid y a los que no. El agradecimiento de por vida, no es suficiente verdad? 

 

Acabe los Perks

Joder ya son las 3 de la mañana... La campaña consiste en hacerme un regalo que no me puedo permitir entre muchos amigos. Me gustaria agradecerlo a cada uno de vosotros con un viaje a una isla paradisiaca y no parar de hacer actividades divertidas y emocionantes dia y noche pero como no me lo puedo permitir os dejo unas opciones que estare encantado de cumplir con cada uno de vosotros. 

Podeis colaborar con lo más minimo (Todavia no se cuanto es) pero imagino que 5 dolares?

La hoja de reclamaciones esta en la gestoria...

Prometo ser mas original el proximo cumpleaños.

Empieza la cuenta atras... Todos invitados el 15 de Diciembre a ver el partido que sera toda una fiesta futbolistica de almas bellisimas y alegría a por doquier.

 

Muchas Gracias simplemente por habertelo pensado, todo un detalle. 

 

Espero que los que no poneis un duro no sea porque creis que tengo demasiada cara. ¿La tengo? El pensamiento es libre.

Un gran abrazako a todos.

El que nunca dice que no a vuestro apoyo. 

Eloy.

Estoy viviendo en Abu Dhabi (si soy multimillonario, pero me lo gasto todo en fiestas) y el billete es más caro de lo que me puedo permitir en estos momentos, estaba pensando pedir pasta a mi madre como de costumbre... pero el video de mi amiga Esther junto con la campaña en esta pagina de mi amiga Nati me dio la idea de hacer una pedida general a todos esos amigos que quieran hacerme un regalazo este año y se lo puedan permitir. Que cumplo 30. jar jar jar!!!


Partido 15 de Diciembre Sabado (Fieston de cumpleaños y celebración del partido)
Estado mirando villetes y por 500 Euros puedo conseguirlos pero 50 horas de vuelo cosa que me mata pudiendo pasar dos dias más allí. (Solo puedo pedir 4 dias en el trabajo)
Por 700 Leuros puedo conseguir en 23 horas de vuelo y estar en la resaca con todos vosotros.
Se que puedo conseguirlo, no quiero que ninguno se quite de nada por ayudarme. Como siempre siempre estoy en deuda con vosotros pongais o no dinero, ya habeis estado ahi siempre demostrando quienes sois.
No se como pagar los que colaboreis, ya sabeis que siempre me escapo... pero si lo consigo prometo que no faltara alcohol ni buena gente en esa fiesta que pienso organizar despues del partido.
Son las 2 de la mañana (5 horas pa despertarme) y estoy pensando que puedo ofreceros a los que esteis en Madrid y a los que no. El agradecimiento de por vida, no es suficiente verdad? 


 
Acabe los Perks
Joder ya son las 3 de la mañana... La campaña consiste en hacerme un regalo que no me puedo permitir entre muchos amigos. Me gustaria agradecerlo a cada uno de vosotros con un viaje a una isla paradisiaca y no parar de hacer actividades divertidas y emocionantes dia y noche pero como no me lo puedo permitir os dejo unas opciones que estare encantado de cumplir con cada uno de vosotros. 
Podeis colaborar con lo más minimo (Todavia no se cuanto es) pero imagino que 5 dolares?
La hoja de reclamaciones esta en la gestoria...
Prometo ser mas original el proximo cumpleaños.


Empieza la cuenta atras... Todos invitados el 15 de Diciembre a ver el partido que sera toda una fiesta futbolistica de almas bellisimas y alegría a por doquier.
 
Muchas Gracias simplemente por habertelo pensado, todo un detalle. 
 
Espero que los que no poneis un duro no sea porque creis que tengo demasiada cara. ¿La tengo? El pensamiento es libre.
Un gran abrazako a todos.
El que nunca dice que no a vuestro apoyo. 
Eloy.

story:
Haylee Graham

http://hayleegrahambooks.webs.com/

hayleegrahambooks@yahoo.com

 *I'VE REACHED MY 600 GOAL! But I forgot to think of Ground Shipping.  So if there's any chance I could raise $100 more that would be so great! Thank you!!*

I am a 20 year old author of 3 novels, 'FLYWAY' 'CENTAURUS' and 'CLOSER THAN WE KNOW'
Each of my novels are assigned to different charities in which they donate 50% of their proceeds.  Each charity is relevant to the storylines.  

FLYAWAY contributes towards anti-horse slaughter foundations in protecting the horses of this country.
http://www.scribd.com/doc/129512633/FLYAWAY-Ins...

CENTAURUS donates its proceeds to battered women's shelters in Southern California
http://www.scribd.com/doc/100366517/THE-CENTAUR...
and

CLOSER THAN WE KNOW donates to The American Foundation for Suicide Prevention
http://www.scribd.com/doc/121281557/Hello-From-...

Though they have all achieved a great online following, with my books reaching over 2,300 reads, I thoroughly believe that if I PRINTED them as books, they would sell faster and bring in more money for these foundations.  However, I'm not financially grounded enough to afford to print them.
   

Printing a novel in book form can cost between $500 - $1,000

Sales from my books have been weak, though they have gained a GREAT online following and fanbase.  However, not everyone can read a book online or has a Kindle.  Most people actually prefer an actual book in their hands!

I want to print out one or some of my novels (depending on the amount of donations I receive) so that I can sell them everywhere I go, gather the funds, and send in fatter monthly checks to the foundations listed above. 

I will even take pictures of the checks and post donation receipts for authenticity that the money is going where I say its going!!

This month, from CLOSER THAN WE KNOW'S proceeds, I will only be sending a check of $25 to The American Foundation for Suicide Prevention because the sales have been struggling (despite having over 1,200 reads and FANTASTIC reviews!) The problem, that I've heard from my supporters, is that they don't have a Kindle or nook or would rather read an actual book!

By donating, won't just be helping ME, you'll be contributing to charities in the long run and supporting my writing!  Thank you so much and God bless!
