What We Need & What You Get
This $15k will help with the production of the books and different items that will be sent out with each copy. We will be surprising 200 youth in foster care with their very own copy of the book for Christmas. Not only that, we will be taking it a step further by adding a gift box filled with things that most youth in foster care need. 

Socks
Under Clothes
Pajamas 
Blankets 

& Christmas would not be a success if they didn't have a toy to top it off!!! What is so amazing about this is that it will not only come as a surprise for the children, but also as a surprise for the foster agencies Yasmine will be donating to! 
All money raised will be used as follows:

65% - Developing & printing of Well Now You Know
25% -  Items needed box gift boxes
10% -  Packaging of each gift to be donated 
You will also be able to write a personal note to a child you will be sponsoring, that will be added in each box donated.


The Impact
 STATISTICS: As of Oct 1st, 2020, the State of Georgia has approximately 11,581 children in foster care. Many of these children do not receive gifts for the holidays. The sad part is, some have never even experienced what Christmas is like. Help us change that this Christmas! Know that you will be making a difference in a child's life. According to Kids & Family Reading Report: Families expect more from children's book. Diversity in children's books is highly inclusive. Many children and parents want more diversity in books.  CHARACTERS BUILD CHARACTER.
 

Risks & Challenges
Distribution: Our goal is to be in every household and every bookstore you can possibly think of. We want to have a presence in local books stores right in your back yard. We also would like to be in every elementary school that you can think of. We hope to partner with a book distributor that will help us reach our goal. We know that our goal of donating to 200 kids is kind of a stretch for a 45 day goal, but we know with the help of so many people like you reading this, that this is POSSIBLE and it will happen. 
WORD OF MOUTH: We know the impact that word of mouth can bring. In order for this dream of Yasmine's to be a success, we are asking that you tell a friend, to tell a friend, to tell a friend!!! We plan to also do local pop up shops with local businesses in the Atlanta, Ga, and surrounding areas. Although Covid-19 has stopped local schools from opening, we plan to do virtual readings and also fun challenges surrounding "Well Now You Know"

Other Ways You Can Help
Share this campaign with EVERYONE you know. Social media is taking over, so if you have a Facebook, Instagram, or Twitter account, pl ease share our campaign.

story:
Story of Our Book

We are Maya Albert and Marik Hazan, the authors of Our Trip Together. We wrote this book because we felt the psychedelic ecosystem needed to be understood at a level deeper than just capitalism vs. activism, Western vs. Eastern, or clinical vs. indigenous.

Our hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the field of psychedelics is extremely complex not only in how it operates today, but the long-term externalities of rolling out compounds that change human consciousness on a massive scale. In this book, we hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that we have for understanding psychedelics on a deeper level. Ultimately, we want you to see this book as a tool to help you navigate the ups and downs of psychedelic development over the coming decades, develop a nuanced approach of engaging with the psychedelic ecosystem and those building it, and find ways in which to participate mindfully if you are called to this work.

In this book, you'll learn about the complexities of the psychedelic rollout today and the lessons we need to remember from the past. You’ll learn about how Israeli’s and Palestinians are drinking Ayahuasca together, and how Charles Manson used psychedelics to convince his followers to commit multiple murders. We’ll share stories of “Googler’s” microdosing LSD and how psychedelics were used in concentration camps during the holocaust. You'll learn about psychedelics for end of life care and about healers that are using tarot cards to conduct narrative therapy with these same compounds and plant medicines. You’ll see how these molecules will come to influence politics and business and how culture will transform at unprecedented rates over the next ten years.

You will love this book if you are seeking to understand more about the global rollout of psychedelic medicines and therapeutics, are interested in how culture may change over the next decade as psychedelics become accessible, and some of the incredible work happening today all over the world to push psychedelics far past their ability to heal people with depression.

Our Trip Together is a nonfiction book that speaks to psychedelic guides, entrepreneurs, policy makers, investors, lawyers, activists, and organization builders who want to look at the growth of the psychedelic ecosystem in a new way.
 

The Book - Our Trip Together

The book is written in 4 parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-4. Section 1 is focused on laying the groundwork for psychedelic medicine and providing the reader with background on the most current research, science, and applications of psychedelic medicine. We prime the reader to begin thinking about the application of Psychedelic Assisted Therapy (PAT) to systems instead of individuals.

Part 2 contains chapters 5-8. Section 2 pushes the reader to dive further into what psychedelics can do with regards to changing geopolitical systems and explores lessons from the 50s, 60s, 70s, and 80s. We also review current policy both within the US, Canada, and internationally. Finally we discuss religious exemptions and provide predictions of how policy around psychedelics will evolve in the coming decades.

Part 3 contains chapters 9-12. Section 3 provides context on how business and psychedelics intersect. We cover the current markets, provide a perspective on the intersection of psychedelics and productivity, describe the innovative new businesses that are being created within the industry, and highlight alternative business models that are being adopted by the ecosystem.

Part 4 contains chapters 13-16. Section 4 closes out our text with discussions of psychedelics and media, culture, sustainability, religion, innovation, and community.
 

What We Need & What You'll Get

  • This book will be published with New Degree Press. We set up these pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing our book. All money raised will go towards the following:
  • The Editors we will work with to revise and publish our manuscript in June, 2022.
  • The Cover Design of our book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The Layout Design for the interior of our book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The Copyediting for our book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for our book when we ultimately publish this Summer 2022

We are also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order our book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of our book when we publish and a handwritten thank-you note.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of our book (“with Special Thanks to”).
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from our book, with the opportunity to review it and provide early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting our cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join our Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

About the Author

Marik Hazan has founded multiple organizations, foundations, and startups within the psychedelic ecosystem. He is currently the CEO of Energia, an ecosystem builder for the psychedelics space, and Tabula Rasa Ventures, the first Incubator and Accelerator within the ecosystem. He was selected as one of the 100 Most Influential People in Psychedelics alongside Peter Thiel, Paul Staments, Mike Tyson, and many others. Marik wrote this book to highlight the complexities and nuances of the psychedelics ecosystem while providing contributors within the space a roadmap to both build equity for the future of psychedelics and find community along the way.

For more information, you can connect with Marik Hazan at marik@ourtriptogether.com and @marikhazan on Twitter.

Maya Albert is an operations/project management specialist and writer with experience in industries ranging from media, to hospitality, to high growth entrepreneurship. Before diving into the psychedelic space, she spent many years at the top of the coffee industry, her work earning her print coverage in publications such as Time Magazine and the Wall Street Journal. Recently, Maya was the first noted author of a 200+ page compressive report on the psychedelic space, covering history, policy, science, and the investment landscape. She is the cofounder of the Psyched conference, and consults with Synthesis and the Heroic Hearts Project.

For more information, you can connect with Maya Albert at maya@ourtriptogether.com and @maya___albert on Instagram.

International Preorders

For international preorders, please do the following:
  • Identify the perk that interests you, e.g. 1 or 2 paperbacks
  • Select the pink "Back it" button to "Make a contribution" for the same amount (this choice bypasses the shipping address page)
  • Use this form to share your mailing address, so we can calculate the international shipping costs and invoice you for that amount via PayPal/Venmo
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically our mailing of the book to you. We have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of our book is contingent on the publisher we use. We will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as our book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't get something out of it!
I will reward the top 3 people who refer the most backers at the end of the campaign (30 days).

Here's how:

  1. At the top of the campaign page, you will see the "share" buttons. Click on the "chain" icon to get a custom link just for you. (Note: don't use the URL in the browser window as it won't work to track referrals and you won't get credit.)
  2. Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.
  3. When someone clicks on that link and backs the book, you get 1 entry!

 

Please use #OurTripTogether and tag us as well as our publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!

Instagram - @psychedstudio / @newdegreepress
Facebook - @psychedstudio / @NewDegreePress
Twitter - @psychedstudio / @NewDegreePress

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Marik & Maya

story:
The Story of A Star for Stella

Do you believe the hardest situations in life can actually lead to the most beautiful destinations?

  • A Star for Stella is the story of how one tragic night turned into years of self-discovery for a struggling mother.
  • Leia Baez’s eye-opening journey forces her to re-evaluate her life, her habits and the kind of role model she wants to be for her daughter.
  • Her testimony is proof that anything is possible with faith. Leia’s story exemplifies how traumatic situations can be used for good and growth.
My name is Leia Baez, and I am the author of A Star for Stella. I wrote this book because I’ve personally experienced the power in storytelling and the positive impact you can have on others when you have the courage to be vulnerable and share your truth.

It has been a dream of mine since I was a little girl to write a book. I remember meeting an author at the Omaha Public Library in elementary school and thinking how cool it was that someone’s story was inside those pages.

I have always loved being a storyteller, too. As a former journalist at the Omaha World-Herald newspaper for roughly 14 years, I took great pride in sharing other people’s stories of inspiration and hope.

Now, I am sharing my own story in a memoir titled, A Star for Stella: A Mother's Journey to Overcome & Find Purpose in Pain. I’m confident this book will help you wherever you are in your journey and be the motivation you need to keep going. I’m hopeful this book will lead you to the next step in being the best version of you. When you have the courage to face whatever is holding you back, that’s where your level up happens.

A Star for Stella will take you through my journey to overcome a variety of obstacles. It’s a story of self-discovery, healing trauma, overcoming alcoholism, dealing with divorce and fighting to be the best version of me so I can be the best mother possible.

You will love this book if you admire a great comeback story. My story is a testament to “tough times don’t last, tough people do.”

A Star for Stella speaks to mothers and anyone who has struggled with addiction, abuse or self-doubt. This memoir offers an uplifting story of perseverance for anyone who has failed or made a mistake and felt like life was over.

Ultimately, I hope that A Star for Stella inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:
  • How do we develop a positive mindset when we feel the world is against us?
  • What motivation do we need to pull out of the dark times?
  • How can we overcome an addiction to alcohol in a society where binge drinking is normalized?

I really look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers!
 

What We Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go toward the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December, 2021.
  • The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this winter.
I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and my subtitle.
  • You will be invited to join my "Dream Team" Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!
 

Campaign Goals 

The goal of this pre-order campaign is to sell at least 220 copies in 30 days in order for the author to hit Tier 3, which includes:

  • Tier 3: Hit $8,500 in pre-orders and get the ebook/softcover editions published as well as the hardcover and audiobook editions published. 
     

About the Author

Leia Baez is an award-winning journalist, government communications director, mindset coach and motivational speaker. While Leia spent most of her career telling other people’s stories as a journalist, it’s her own story of overcoming adversity that went viral online, reaching more than 6.5 million people across the globe. Leia’s story proves the power of a positive mindset and continues to inspire people to embrace the difficult times in life.

Leia is passionate about motherhood, mentoring, community service and sharing the power of storytelling.

For more information, you can connect with Leia Baez via e-mail at info@leiabaez.com and on
Instagram , Facebook , Twitter and LinkedIn. 

 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please do the following:

  • Identify the perk that interests you, e.g. 1 or 2 paperbacks
  • Select the pink "Back it" button to "Make a contribution" for the same amount (this choice bypasses the shipping address page)
  • Use this form https://forms.gle/8GqJT2WGEQqzuNBMA to share your mailing address, so I can calculate the international shipping costs and invoice you for that amount via PayPal/Venmo

Risks & Challenges 

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't get something out of it!
I will reward the top 3 people who refer the most backers at the end of the campaign (30 days). Here's how:

  1. At the top of the campaign page, you will see the "share" buttons. Click on the "chain" icon to get a custom link just for you. (Note: don't use the URL in the browser window as it won't work to track referrals and you won't get credit.)
  2. Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.
  3. When someone clicks on that link and backs the book, you get 1 entry!

Please use #StarforStella and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!

Facebook - @leiabaezspeaks / @NewDegreePress
Twitter - @leiabaez / @NewDegreePress

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Reach for the stars,
Leia Baez

story:
My name Is Sam Aronow. I'm a filmmaker, actor, and writer for such online publications as The Avocado. As an immigrant to Israel, I wanted to find a travelogue about my adopted country, but was frustrated that everything I found was more focused on politics and religion than I cared for. Since then, I've begun writing a book about Israel for the rest of us.

In a previous Indiegogo campaign for this book, I raised enough money to travel around the northern part of the country, and it was incredible. I met a lot of great people, discovered a lot of great stories, and uncovered some of the less appreciated corners of the land: Haifa's underground club scene, the secret history of Nazareth, breakfast with a former teenage Palmach fighter, and witnessing firsthand the final days of the Battle of Quneitra on our Syrian border.

Now that the weather has cooled down, it's time to do the South. I'm going to cover some of the more well-trod spots like Jerusalem and the Dead Sea, but also plan to highlight less appreciated spots on the long journey from Tel Aviv to Eilat: playing with sand cats, taking lunch with real-life Samaritans, wine tasting on the kibbutz, and much more. The best parts will be the most unexpected.

The biggest cost on this leg will be hotel accommodations– specifically in Jerusalem, Beersheba, Mitzpe Ramon, and Eilat. Food will be the next-biggest expense, and transportation after that. The whole trip should take no more than two weeks, with the book to be finished by the end of January 2019.

That's where you come in: for $25, you will receive an electronic copy of the finished book. For $50, you will receive an autographed hard copy, and for $100, you will receive an autographed hard copy and a personal thanks in the acknowledgements. Of course, you can give any amount you prefer. Let's get to it!

Summary

Our beloved SVG is being ravaged, from top to bottom, by the dreaded Chikungunzie virus, which is spread by interminable press huggings, on-air invective, name-calling, public insults and general contempt for the citizenry.

Every household, every family, in every town and village across the country has been infected by this painful virus.  IT MUST BE STOPPED if our country is to be restored to good health!

Your small monetary donation will help us to rid our country of this crippling condition once and for all.  

ACT NOW to save your country's health!

What...

We are asking you for a small contribution towards the sum of US$5,000 to purchase anti-chikungunzie retro-virtuals which will be administered via the internet.

  • Your small contribution of any amount is welcome!
  • That small sum will help us to return the country to good health!

Why?

Do you want the day to come when your children or their children ask: what did YOU do to halt the destruction of SVG caused by the dreaded chikungunzie virus - and your answer is: "Uuuhh, ahmm..."?

No, you don't.  Nuff said.

------------

story:
“We must never stop dreaming. Dreams provide nourishment for the soul, just as a meal does for the body.” 

Short Summary

Who is she?

Tugce defines herself as a heavy reveler, permanent dreamer, life lover, bad dancer, joy sharer, modern hippie, evening runner, macaroni eater, internet surfer and nature carer. A 23 years old university student from Istanbul/Turkey.

I have a dream. Walking the ancient The Way of Saint James.

I'll be on the road at least 2 months and I need support for my daily needs. I'm planning stay my sleeping bag, but I have to upgrade better one. On the mountains and rural areas, there will be temperature difference between day&night time.

What I Need

I don't need that much of thing. Just buying a 4 seasons tent or sleeping bag to keep costs minimum for accomodation. Cost is around 500 dollars or less for both.

The minimum food and beverage, health expenses for 60 days. = 1200 euros.

And for emergency situations = 300 euros.

You can help me for sharing my campaign! :)

story:
Who are we and what are we doing?

A year ago, award-winning journalist Dan Bell and leading expert on men’s issues Glen Poole set up insideMAN, an online magazine dedicated to pioneering a new kind of conversation about men and boys.

The magazine was inspired by the fact that in the many years both had spent thinking, writing and talking about men's issues, the mainstream cultural conversation about gender had pretty much stuck to a single simplistic and inaccurate narrative: Women have problems, Men are problems.

But the truth is far less black and white. From educational underachievement and fatherlessness, to homelessness and suicide, there are many grave inequalities that hit men and boys hardest.

As two men who care passionately about tackling these issues, Dan and Glen realised that if we’re serious about improving the lives of men and boys, first we have to change the conversation we have about them.

Changing the narrative

Over the past year insideMAN has drawn on its passionate community of readers and writers to publish literally hundreds of amazing stories about what it means to be a man today — stories you simply wouldn’t be able to read anywhere else.

Now we’re pushing this discussion into the mainstream by publishing a ground-breaking book that combines the best of these articles, with new and exclusive content from some of the UK’s highest-profile thinkers and writers about men and masculinity, from across the political spectrum.

On board we have Martin Daubney, of Telegraph Men and former editor of Loaded; Guardian regular Ally Fogg; Tim Samuels from BBC Men’s Hour; Neil Lyndon, author of Sexual Impolitics and the seminal No More Sex War; and the man who coined the term “metrosexual” himself, the brilliant Mark Simpson.

In addition, the book contains compelling first-person stories from around 40 of insideMAN’s amazing community of readers and writers.

It's got everything from a poignant insight into a fathers' experience of miscarriage, to an irreverent celebration of male-objectification, as well as fascinating explorations of subjects most if us simply take for granted – for example, why do men wear trousers anyway? The book also includes practical advice from leading advocates on the best ways to raise awareness of the issues faced by men and boys.



What do we need and what do you get?

Our target total of £2,000 will cover: The cost of publication, including pre-print costs such as typesetting and ISBN registration; a short initial run of 100 paperback copies and 10 hard back copies; and the conversion of the book to eBook and Kindle formats.

In exchange, we're offering a great set of rewards that combine hard facts about the issues that affect men and boys, with fascinating first-person stories from some of UK's best writers on men and masculinity.

insideMAN Book -- In limited edition hardback, paperback and eBook formats

Own a unique, insightful, heartfelt and surprising collection of stories about what it means to be a man today, including exclusive articles from leading writers from the BBC, the Telegraph and Guardian.

Equality4Men Book -- In eBook format

So why do we need to talk about men's issues anyway? This book has the hard data  from the UK on everything from the fact that men make up 90% of those who sleep rough and that suicide kills three times as many men as women, to why society struggles to acknowledge areas where men face disadvantage -- all brought together in one exhaustively-referenced book by insideMAN's Glen Poole.

Whether you're new to the conversation and want to learn more about the issues, or you're looking for the hard facts to back up your arguments, this book is for you.

An evening with insideMAN launch event -- Friday 11 September, London

It's great to foster discussion online and in the media, but it's all the more powerful to meet and talk face-to-face. Join some of the leading writers and thinkers on men's issues in the UK with an evening of lively debate about men, masculinity and manhood to mark the launch of the book.

The event will take place on the evening of Friday 11 September in London, venue and line up to be confirmed.



Other Ways You Can Help

We don't just want to publish a book, we want to harness the momentum of the campaign to encourage more people to engage in this important conversation.

So if you're not able to back us by donating to one of our rewards -- or even if you are -- it would be fantastic if you could help us spread the word by:

  • Sending a link to this campaign page to anyone who knows a man or a boy
  • Telling us what you think in a comment or a tweet using #insideMANbook
  • Following us on Twitter @insideMANmag and Facebook

A massive thank you to all of the amazing men and women who have got involved over the past year.  In particular we'd like to mention the inspiring men who gave us their time to contribute to our video: Dr Jon Hastie, trustee of DMD Pathfinders; Seany O'Kane, specialist fatherhood practitioner with the St Michael's Fellowship; writer and musician Chris Good; Oliver Wilson, founder of the Boxing Inclusion Zone; journalist Ally Fogg and Dr Arian Bloodwood, social theorist, accountant, clothes designer and gender pioneer.

story:
La garderie La Chanterelle est un lieu agréable, accueillant et éducatif pour les enfants qui la fréquentent. 
Cependant, la cour arrière aurait grand besoin d'être rajeunie et ce, tant pour les grands que pour les poupons. 
C'est pourquoi nous vous demandons votre aide aujourd'hui. Pour rendre la cour plus joyeuse mais aussi plus sécuritaire, le plan étant de remplacer une partie de l'asphalte par du gazon synthétique, beaucoup plus doux pour les petits genoux qui le rencontrent!

 Nous avons besoin de 1500$ pour mener à bien ce projet qui nous tient à coeur, à nous les parents du conseil de parents de la garderie. 

Cet argent servirait à recouvrir la terrasse des poupons de gazon synthétique ainsi qu'une partie de la cour arrière des grands.


Si vous contribuez à cette campagne, vous pourrez recevoir des articles faits par les petites mains des amis de la garderie. Un beau souvenir du passage des enfants à la Chanterelle!

Chaque dollar qui sera donné dans le cadre de cette campagne fera la différence. En notre nom et aux noms des enfants, merci de votre générosité!

Et n'hésitez pas à partager autour de vous!

story:
Kids look forward to it each day!

The perfect gift for children, grandchildren, nieces, nephews, friends' kids, and more.

Order now to receive in time for the new school year!

Our Story:

My name is Sharona Saltzman.  As a mom, I wanted to make sure my daughter Shayna knew I was thinking about her even when she was at school.  I tried using lunch notes I found on the internet but Shayna found them all BORING!  So I decided to create my own little daily notes that would make Shayna laugh and teach her something, too.

After a while, Shayna and her friends began looking forward to these clever little notes each day.  Some days, the kids wouldn’t even wait until lunchtime to find out what the note of the day was. This ignited the creation of the MyWish4U company and product line.  I teamed up with another mom, graphic designer Hadas Propper, and now our product line includes 6 colorfully illustrated 5" x 5" books (101 unique  tear off notes in each) chock full of fun and interesting information. 


Lunch Notes From Me!

Just tear off and slip a Note into your kid's lunch box.  These fun little notes will teach them  something and make them laugh, too! Your kids will look forward to it each day.  Four different Lunch Note books  to choose from (101 unique tear off notes in each): 


Anytime Conversations: 

Ask questions anytime and anywhere: on a road trip, at the dinner table, or on a plane. “Anytime Conversations” will encourage times of laughter, deeper connection, and joy (101 different questions). 


Love Notes & Reward Coupons: 

Express love to your children and help them grow up with confidence.  Make your child feel like the most important person in your world by the things you say and do.  Put love notes on their pillow or in their backpack, and reward them for what they are doing right (50 unique Love Notes/50 unique Reward Coupons).


We Need Your Support!

We would like to sell these products online and at stores such as Bed Bath & Beyond, Target, Barnes & Noble, and various toy stores.  We need initial seed money to print and market these books.   That’s why we’re doing a pre-sale here at IndieGoGo.  Have your kids be the first to enjoy these books as much as ours do!

If you don't have kids, or find that your kids are too old to enjoy these, you can buy some books and donate them to your favorite children's organization (we will deliver them for free).  There are many worthwhile children's organizations:  Make A Wish, Children's Hospital, Boy's Club, Save the Children, your local temple or church, and countless others. 


Together We can Make an Impact!

Creating a positive relationship with your children is important if you want to have a happy family life!  It takes good communication and creativity to maintain a loving connection with them.

Mywish4u is dedicated to fostering love and thoughtful communication with families.  Our products help parents connect with their children, strengthen their relationship, and also inspire kids towards the road of success.


Shipping

Shipping within the United States has been included within the perk cost. International shipping will be calculated depending on your location. Towards the end of the campaign, we will be reaching out to our international customers and sending them the estimated shipping cost for their purchase. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us get the word out and share this on Facebook, Twitter, and Pinterest!


Thank You So Much for Your Support!

Sharona Saltzman and Hadas Propper

story:
¿Que es Herederos de La Guerra de las Galaxias?

Es una forma nueva de ver y disfrutar el universo de George Lucas. Dos vertientes unidas. Las personas que se visten de los personajes de saga en los eventos y las que crean esos eventos para que Star Wars siga vivo.

Esta exposición fotográfica, aunque tiene algunas buenas fotos, no pretende ser una obra artística, sino más bien histórica, por un lado, captadas de una forma espontánea, sin buscar la pose, y por otro buscando una pose que no suele ser la habitual. Reflejan la diversión, las ganas y los lugares donde ha “olido” a Star Wars. Es un homenaje a mis amigos, a las asociaciones, a las personalidades del “fandom” y a los que quieren pasar desapercibidos.

Aunque los portada del libro, quizás parezca lo contrario, la importancia de estas imágenes, es que las personas que se visten de personajes con mascaras y cascos, dejen su timidez a un lado y se desprendan de ese “poder” que les da la mascara. Es interesante, conocerlos, quererlos y respetar el trabajo que hacen de forma desinteresada. Además de enseñar los rostros que hay debajo, de todos esos personajes tan emblemáticos, que han llenado nuestra imaginación, quiero mostrar las caras de todas esas personas, que han estado o siguen estando muy relacionadas con el universo y con los fans españoles de Star Wars, como ilustradores y dibujantes de cómics, coleccionistas, costumizadores, creadores de props, organizadores de eventos este es mi homenaje, y el fin de esta muestra.

Herederos de La Guerra de las Galaxias es una minima parte de un archivo personal que empezó en la Star Wars Celebration Europe de 2007 hasta la actualidad y que espero que siga “engordándose” día a día.

Sobre el autor:

JOSE GRACIA


José Gracia Pont, 21 Junio 1967 Barcelona. Actualmente vive en Valencia

Entre 1991 y 1992 crea el fanzine The Force cuando todo el mundo da por terminado el tema Star Wars. A su vez, inaugura una tienda dedicada al coleccionismo de Star Wars llamada Yoda & Compayia, con el que será director del fanzine competidor y editado también por Camaleón Ediciones; Dark Side. The Force sigue sobreviviendo convertido en "prozine" (Fanzine impreso con estética de revista) hasta 1998-99

Coincidiendo con el estreno del Episodio I, se consiguen para España los derechos del Club y la Revista Oficial. Jose Gracia pasa a ser codirector y colaborador de Star Wars Magazine y presidente del Star Wars The Official Spanish Fan Club, hasta 2001.En 2003 el Club y el Magazine es cedido a José María Arosa y se seguirá editando hasta 2006 por Bilba Ediciones.

Además ha escrito artículos para revistas especializadas como Todo Pantallas, Slumberland, Lider, Dolmen y para los cómics Manga de Star Wars. También los textos para la colección de cromos Spanish Cards, Cificom 1 y 2 y Star Wars Figure Archives (de venta exclusiva en la web La Casa de Kenobi, www.lacasadekenobi.com). Ha sido entrevistado innumerables veces en prensa, radio y televisión, en diciembre de 2012 tuvo el privilegio de aparecer en el programa de BTB, Respira, del que se siente muy orgulloso. Aparece haciendo un Cameo en el fanfilm Imperio Oscuro Transición, y no aparece en el Episodio I, porque la licencia del club fue aprobada un poco más tarde, tampoco apareció en el documental Descubriendo a David Prowse, de Toni Bestard y Marcos Cabotá, porque en septiembre de 2013, tuvo un incidente, que le provoca una lesión medular.

Ha impartido conferencias en Cifimad, Weekendtrek, Fnac, Universo Star Wars El Corte Inglés, Cificom y Salón del Comic de Barcelona. También ha hecho sus pinitos como fotógrafo con la exposición: Star Wars Portraits /Herederos de La Guerra de las Galaxias, un retrato del “fandom” español visto desde dentro.

Está actualmente trabajando en varios libros relacionados con Star Wars.

¿Cómo?


Para este proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 2000€; Con esta cantidad conseguiríamos, una edición limitada de 250 ejemplares. Es el limite de copias que The Force Group, cree que se hubiesen vendido en tiendas especializadas, incluyendo a las personas que aparecen fotografiadas en el interior de la obra, si lo hubiésemos podido autofinanciar nosotros.

Los mecenas de este proyecto tendrán ventajas como:

  • Recibir un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Ver tu nombre e incluso tu foto en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán para sacar adelante esta edición limitada y numerada (e incluso firmada) de Herederos de la Guerra de las Galaxias que saldría pocas semanas después a la venta.

El impacto


Esta obra con posterioridad al envió de los ejemplares destinados a los mecenas, sera presentado y estará a la venta en Cificom 2015, Cosmic/Planeta Comic, Norma Comics y otras tiendas relacionadas con el Fandom de Star Wars

Además...


Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogs, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Jose Gracia vea publicada su obra. 

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.
story_txt:
¿Que es Herederos de La Guerra de las Galaxias?

Es una
forma nueva de ver y disfrutar  el universo de George
Lucas. Dos vertientes
unidas. Las personas que se visten de los personajes de saga en los
eventos y las que crean esos eventos para que Star
Wars siga vivo.


Esta
exposición fotográfica, aunque tiene algunas buenas fotos, no
pretende ser una obra artística, sino más bien histórica, por un
lado, captadas de una forma espontánea, sin buscar la pose, y por
otro buscando una pose que no suele ser la habitual. Reflejan la
diversión, las ganas y los lugares donde  ha “olido” a Star
Wars. Es un homenaje a mis
amigos, a las asociaciones, a las personalidades del “fandom”
y a los que quieren pasar desapercibidos.


Aunque
los portada del libro, quizás parezca lo contrario, la importancia
de estas imágenes, es que las personas que se visten de personajes
con mascaras y cascos, dejen su timidez a un lado y se desprendan de
ese “poder” que les da la mascara. Es interesante, conocerlos,
quererlos y respetar el trabajo que hacen de forma desinteresada.
Además de enseñar los rostros que hay debajo, de todos esos
personajes tan emblemáticos, que han llenado nuestra imaginación,
quiero mostrar las caras de todas esas personas, que han estado o
siguen estando muy relacionadas con el universo y con los fans
españoles de Star Wars,
como ilustradores y dibujantes de cómics, coleccionistas,
costumizadores, creadores de props, organizadores de eventos 
este es mi homenaje, y el fin de esta muestra.


Herederos
de La Guerra de las Galaxias
es una minima parte de un archivo personal que empezó en la Star
Wars Celebration
Europe de 2007
hasta la actualidad y que espero que siga “engordándose” día a
día.

story:
Have you ever wanted to truly know what goes on inside the head of Sherlock Holmes? Have you wanted to be able to read people and their expressions like books? Have you ever wanted to read a room and all the tells and clues that it provides? Then this is the book for you. 

The Monographs is a complete and comprehensive manual that will impart the lessons on everything you need to know to become a Deductionist in today’s world. Contained within you will learn how to think and approach problem solving like the famed detective, spot liars in person and through their handwriting, deduce clues, personality traits, and the personal details of people through their phones, watches and clothes. Figure out where people live from the shoes that they wear, deduce what they do for a living, how to build a memory palace as intricate and perfect as the one that is written about, histories, theory, application, how to train, practice and develop your skills. All this and much, much more. 

After you read this book not only will you see the world but you will truly observe what goes on inside it as well. Your name will still be your own, but you can make it your business to know what other people do not know.

story:
As a kid books helped me understand the world. My parents were great about giving me books to help me understand a particular issue  or phase in my life. From new siblings to understanding why my mom was tired from working late, books gave me a way to understand new concepts and gave me the vocabulary to talk about these subjects with the adults in my life.

     Momo's Book Club is a subscription box service for kids picture books. As a nanny, babysitter and teacher, I have a vast knowledge of picture books and kids and I've seen the need for these books. Books that talk about other cultures and races, books that features different family structures, books that  depict the world we live in.

     Giving kids a way to talk about different topics, giving parents a way to talk about topics that are difficult to broach is so important especially in today's world.

What we need and what you get:

- To get Momo's Club started I'm looking to raise $1000. This will cover the platform fee for the subscription box service, boxes and will allow me to purchase books in bulk for my first 6 book tracks: books featuring racial diverse families, books that celebrate uniqueness, books featuring different family structures, books that deal with bullying, books about welcoming new siblings and books about adoption. The plan is to expand with new tracks as we grow.

And to help me accomplish this I've lined up some cool literary themed perks from awesome local artist! Take a peek, I'm excited to share them with you!

In the event we don't reach our funding goal, we will still use what you have given so generously but start on a smaller scale. Every bit truly helps!

Risk & Challenges

My biggest challenge will be getting the word out about Momo's Book Club. I really believe in my book club, and I know when people find they'll love it. But how will people find it? Thankfully working at a school and babysitting, I have a great base of parents to talk to about Momo's Book Club. Even if they're not buying they can help get the word out. I also will be contributing to a local blog that will have many parents reading which is very exciting. That plus social media I have a good basis to let the world know about my book club.

Other ways you can help!

Please help get the word out! Follow Momosbookclub on Instagram, like our Facebook page, tell a friend and share the campaign! The best form of advertising is word of mouth!
